mapper.update: update privilege_resource_relationship set privilege_id = #{privilegeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, privilege_id, resource_id, enabled, create_time, update_time from privilege_resource_relationship
